articles.description: The Luna Ring is marketed as an incredibly light smart ring. It's 3mm slim design, fighter-jet grade titanium body
articles.content: Homegrown smart wearables brand, Noise officially enters the market for wearable technology’s premium smart ring segment by launching the health-tracking smart ring Luna Ring. The device supports wir… [+4132 chars]
